home.text: Welcome to the exciting world of 3D Tic Tac Toe! Immerse yourself in a unique 3D experience where you will have the opportunity to deploy your strategy in 3D space and test your mental acuity in a new dimension of this classic game.

not-found.text: The page you are looking for does not exist.

rules.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the exciting world of Tic-Tac-Toe 3D! This game combines the classic Tic-Tac-Toe gameplay with a three-dimensional space, creating an engaging gameplay and a visual experience.
rules.makeMovesValue: Each player takes turns placing their symbol ('X' or 'O') on the available cells of the game.
rules.winTheGameValue: The player who first forms a line of three of their symbols in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal direction wins the game.
rules.gameCompletionValue: If all cells are filled, and no line is formed, the game ends in a draw, theoretically. But there is a proof that it is impossible to play in a draw in 3D Tic-Tac-Toe. Here an interesting article about this.
rules.restartGameValue: At any point you can restart the game and start it from the very beginning by clicking on the appropriate button
rules.enjoyExperienceValue: Utilize rotation and zoom features to enjoy the three-dimensional aspect of the game.
rules.enjoyMessage: Playing Tic-Tac-Toe 3D is engaging and intriguing! Enjoy the game and defeat your opponent. Good luck!

about.aboutMessage: At Tic-Tac-Toe 3D, we believe in blending nostalgia with innovation. Our vision is to provide players with a fresh perspective on a timeless game, bringing excitement and strategy to each move.
about.visionMessage: Welcome to Tic-Tac-Toe 3D, a modern twist on the classic game we all know and love. This immersive experience takes the traditional Tic-Tac-Toe to a whole new dimension, quite literally!
about.feature1Description: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning 3D environment that adds a new layer of challenge and enjoyment.
about.feature2Description: With the added dimension, the game requires a strategic approach to conquer your opponent. Think ahead and plan your moves wisely.
about.feature3Description: Easily navigate through the game with user-friendly controls. Rotate and zoom to explore the 3D game board effortlessly.
about.feature4Description: While we embrace the classic rules of Tic-Tac-Toe, our modern design and 3D setting offer a refreshing and engaging experience.
about.enjoyMessage: Whether you're a seasoned Tic-Tac-Toe player or new to the game, Tic-Tac-Toe 3D promises an entertaining and challenging experience for players of all ages. Dive into the world of three-dimensional strategy and have fun playing Tic-Tac-Toe like never before!

board.gameAlreadyOveredDescription: You can not make moves anymore
